resources.string: Parental control tool focused on the management of the digital lifestyle of children/adolescents whose objective is to identify potentially violent situations and create an ecosystem that facilitates early detection of various disorders derived from an inadequate or unreliable use of technology. information.
Already a user? Log in now
Make a search to see results

Help in the digital education of children / adolescents, allowing to define daily habits of use and knowledge about their behavior in social media.

We obtain information about your activity in social media
We determine its relationship with the different risk groups
Here you have the main options of the application, you will see results, generated alerts and the list of supervised children in the system
Here you have the children you can tutor, you can access the details of them, in addition to registering a new one in the system

The family locator will allow you to visualize the current position of your child. You can also configure supervised areas (Geofences) to receive alerts when the child enters or leaves the area

During my professional experience I have sought to boost my work qualities such as enthusiasm, responsibility and achievement of objectives that arise in any project, taking into account the importance of improvement or personal improvement and the working group where I had the opportunity to participate.
